Articles.Content: What was the mod name that added navball to the screen when Kerbals goes EVA?

Maybe "Steam Guages"?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40730-0-23-5-SteamGauges-V1-5-1-og-Radar-Altimeter-and-More!

Or "Nano Guages"?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84409-1-0-2-NanoGauges-tiny-ana1og-gauges-for-kerbalnauts-0-7-9-1027

Not sure if they do what you're looking for though as I've not used them personally.
There is Navhud. Maybe not quite what you're looking at, as it makes a sort of hud of the navball on screen, but it does work on EVA and can be rather useful
